keyword: how many calories are in a cosmic brownie
title: How Many Calories Are in a Cosmic Brownie?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a cosmic brownie, including full nutrition breakdown like carbs, fat, protein, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Cosmic Brownie?
assumptions: Standard Little Debbie Cosmic Brownie; one individually wrapped serving (50 g) with chocolate icing and candy sprinkles.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, recipe, size, and ingredients; check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A cosmic brownie has about 360 calories, with high sugar and fat content.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add a scoop of vanilla ice cream
Homemade with whole wheat flour and less sugar

faqs.q: How many calories are in a cosmic brownie?
faqs.a: Approximately 360 calories per standard cosmic brownie.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a cosmic brownie?
faqs.a: About 48 g of carbs, including 32 g of sugars.

faqs.q: Is a cosmic brownie high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, it contains 18 g of total fat, with 8 g saturated.

faqs.q: How much protein is in a cosmic brownie?
faqs.a: Only about 2 g of protein per brownie.

faqs.q: Do cosmic brownies have trans fats?
faqs.a: Typically 0 g trans fat in standard brands like Little Debbie.
